definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: I think Zhang Ziyi is better.
Zhang Ziyi has been criticized for not replying to accusations of charity fraudleveled against her.
sentences.chinese: 章子怡因一直未對“詐捐”指責做出迴應而飽受批評。

sentences.english: The truth finally coming out, Zhang could not help tearing when being interviewed.
sentences.chinese: 一切水落石出，章子怡在接受採訪時泣不成聲。

sentences.english: Zhang Ziyi is the hottest film star in China.
sentences.chinese: 章子怡是中國最紅的電影明星。

sentences.english: It is Zhang Ziyi that (who) stars the film Heroes.
sentences.chinese: 是章子儀主演的《英雄》這部電影。

sentences.english: From my perspective, Zhang’s fault lies in her unique role, a world-famous star.
sentences.chinese: 在我看來，章子怡錯就錯在她是一個世界級的影星。

sentences.english: If Zhang Ziyi will never again be "female one, " How will she face?
sentences.chinese: 如果章子怡將永遠不再是“女一號”，她將如何面對？

sentences.english: International star Zhag ziyi appeared in a number of Hollywood movies.
sentences.chinese: 國際巨星章子怡出演了很多好萊塢電影。

sentences.english: In the forum, a wealth of neticizens still attacked Zhang fiercely.
sentences.chinese: 在論壇裏，看到不少網友依然對章子怡羣起而攻之。

sentences.english: Why are Zhang Ziyi and Yang Ziqiong famous in Hollywood?
sentences.chinese: 在好萊塢，爲什麼章子怡和楊紫瓊出名？

sentences.english: After starring in Chinese director Feng Xiaogang's big-budget film "The Banquet," she is looking forward to the next film.
sentences.chinese: 拍攝完馮小剛導演的《夜宴》，章子怡期待新的片約。

sentences.english: Zhang Ziyi was accused of lip-synching during the annual Spring Festival evening gala broadcast live on Wednesday night.
sentences.chinese: 章子怡被指在星期三晚上直播的春節聯歡晚會上假唱。

definition: to affix a seal/to stamp (a document)/to sign off on sth
red ink paste used for seal
to affix a seal/to stamp (a document)
inscription with name, date, or short sentence, on a painting, gift, letter etc
book/notebook/Japanese-style self-published comic (esp. an erotic one), aka "dōjinshi"/CL:本[ben3]/edition
signature (in grass-style writing)/symbol used in place of a signature (on a document, contract etc)
recreative seal, bearing not the owner's name but a well-known verse or such, and used for artistic purposes on paintings etc
